name: FROGGY (Sharkdaw)
description:
FROGGY is a 3D Arcade game where you have to eat and collect everything you can.

In this game you have to analyze the environment. You will have to devour the most flies but be careful, you only have 1 minute 30 to get maximum points.

There is a color code for the flies:

- Red: Gives you a speed penalty

- Green: Gives you a speed bonus

- Blue: Gives you 1 point

- Orange: Gives you 5 points

- Purple: Gives you 10 points

In addition, there are coins scattered around the 4 corners of the map, it will give you 50 points.

This game playable with the mouse/Keyboard and controller.

CONTROLS KEYBOARD :

⭐ - MOUSE to Move Camera

⭐ - ZQSD to Move Player

⭐ - LEFT CLICK to Attack

⭐ - SPACE BAR to Jump

CONTROLS Controller :

⭐ - RIGHT STICK to Move Camera

⭐ - LEFT STICK to Move Player

⭐ - X to Attack

⭐ - A to Jump

TOOLS USED :

🔧 - Unreal Engine 4 (4.27.1)

🔧 - Audacity

🔧 - Blender

🔧 - Krita

🔧 - GIMP

DEVELOPER :

Martin JOUBERT itch.io - Instagram - Twitter - YouTube - Fiverr
